Docs.summary: Specifies options to use for getting the path to a special folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Environment.SpecialFolderOption enumeration is used to define the precise behavior of the <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolderOption Create = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: The path to the folder is created if it does not already exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolderOption DoNotVerify = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: The path to the folder is returned without verifying whether the path exists. If the folder is located on a network, specifying this option can reduce lag time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolderOption None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The path to the folder is verified. If the folder exists, the path is returned. If the folder does not exist, an empty string is returned. This is the default behavior.
